question: You are going to spend your vacation in Rome, Italy. Your friend's grandfather lives there and has offered to let you stay in his apartment. Write a letter to your friend's grandfather. In your letter: Thank him for the offer but politely decline infrom him of when you will be in Rome and your travel plans invite him for an outing.
text: How are you?I hope you and your family members all are doing good. I am writing to thank you for your generous offer to let me stay in your apartment during my visit to Rome.

Let me describe my situation. In the beginning, I planned to visit Rome all by myself. But after I had talked to a friend of mine, he told me that he is interested in visiting Rome with me. So, I don't think I would be able to stay in your apartment during my stay in Rome since my friend is going to be with me.

Our flight will be next Monday. Although we are planning to stay in Rome for 3 days only, we would be happy to invite you for a dinner next Thursday at 7:00 P.M. I don't know if this will be convenient for you or not. If it's not a good time for you please, let me know what would be a good time for you.
It would be lovely to hear back from you if you have time to write.
